sub_title: SAP S/4HANA||Implementation||Business Process Expert||Solution Architecture||Cross-functional Collaboration||Project Management||Cutover Management
summary:
As a seasoned SAP functional consultant, I have extensive knowledge of SAP SD and MM functional consulting, with a proven record of delivering successful implementations and enhancements. I specialize in the Order to Cash process, Pricing, Credit Management, Special Business Transactions, Text Processing, Outputs, Partner Determination, Copying Controls, Master Data Management, Integration, System Modification, and ABAP. In addition, my skills include integration with various modules, including SAP MM and FICO. 

Currently, I work as a Senior BPE for Commercial Order Fulfilment at NXP Semiconductors, leading a multi-cultural team of 12 efficient consultants and successfully managing projects worth 2Mn USD. My current work includes a large S4 HANA migration program, and I have a track record of meeting project deadlines and exceeding customer expectations. With strong problem-solving skills, I have delivered innovative solutions that meet business requirements. I have expertise in using User Exits, Field Exits, BADI and BAPI to enhance system functionalities, allowing me to deliver high-quality solutions that meet the unique needs of my clients.

In addition to my experience in traditional SAP systems, I have also gained expertise in SAP S4 HANA. My deep understanding of the SAP S4 HANA functionalities and technical know-how have equipped me with the ability to deliver innovative solutions that meet the latest technology advancements in the SAP landscape. As a results-driven professional with a passion for technology and a commitment to customer satisfaction, I have demonstrated an ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring project delivery within budget and on time.

I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and experience to any organization, whether it's a migration project or a new implementation. My ability to deliver high-quality solutions, coupled with my passion for technology and commitment to customer satisfaction, make me a strong candidate for any SAP consulting role.

profile_positions.description:
In my current position as an IT Manager specializing in Supply Chain and Finance, I play a pivotal role in managing the organization's ERP system, JDE, while spearheading the transformation to SAP S4 Hana. With extensive expertise in SAP SD/MM and Interfaces with FI/PP, I bring a strategic approach to selecting tools and solutions that yield substantial ROI and minimize total cost of ownership. A significant aspect of my accountability lies in overseeing program and project finances, ensuring that targets are met while optimizing resource allocation. Through effective stakeholder management, I foster alignment between business and IT objectives, driving successful delivery of core ERP capabilities and enabling innovative solutions.

In addition to my technical prowess, I actively contribute to organizational development by cultivating talent and refining leadership skills across the company. By staying ahead of market trends and continuously expanding my knowledge through research and participation in technology vendor events, I am well-equipped to proactively introduce relevant capabilities to enhance our applications product line. With a strong focus on collaboration and effective communication, I successfully manage external delivery partners and vendors, leveraging their expertise to augment our IT capabilities. Furthermore, my proficiency in managing multi-location teams and handling multiple critical issues simultaneously allows me to maintain operational efficiency and drive project success. I take pride in my ability to navigate complex and dynamic environments, working seamlessly with senior leadership teams to drive business outcomes. Fluent in English and possessing excellent verbal and written communication skills, I am skilled in delivering formal presentations and effectively engaging with diverse audiences.

Involved in a Green Field S4 Implementation Project.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager -Supply Chain and Finance

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior BPE for Commercial Order Fulfilment (COF) at NXP Semiconductors, my role is to ensure high-quality IT delivery and support for the SAP Sales and Distribution (SD) module and integrated systems within the SAP ECC and S/4 HANA environment. I play a key role in linking the COF business processes with IT solutions, working closely with stakeholders and key users to drive informed decision-making and drive efficiencies in the COF operations.

I leverage my expertise and knowledge of the SAP SD module and integrated systems towards delivering successful IT solutions to meet the needs of the business. I remain as a liaison between NXP business processes and IT solutions, collaborating with other IT Sr BPEs and Solution Architects, managing project and change request demand, identifying IT solutions for process improvement, creating and validating business cases, enabling design and implementation of IT solutions, executing projects and change requests within defined budgets and timelines, validating designs and implementation, supporting project and change request lifecycles, and leveraging knowledge of Order Management solutions to define solution roadmaps in collaboration with stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Sr.Business Process Expert-SAP SD

profile_positions.description:
As a Product Configuration Expert in SAP at ASML, my role was to ensure that SAP product variants and options were configured accurately and efficiently in the SAP product configuration tools. I steered testing and validating the configured product variants to make sure they meet customer requirements and provided technical support and guidance to end-users on SAP product configuration and related processes.

I collaborated with cross-functional teams to define product configuration requirements and implementation plans and maintained and updated the product configuration knowledge base. Continuously improving SAP product configuration processes to increase efficiency and accuracy was an important aspect of my role. I ensured that the product configuration data was accurate and up-to-date in SAP systems and provided timely resolution for troubleshooting configuration issues.

I was responsible for maintaining the SAP configurator for ASML machines using variant configuration techniques, while playing a critical role in supporting demand identification, order capturing processes and the order fulfilment process, which enabled achieving ASML's sales and delivery goals. I defined and maintained the basic principles of the configurator design in SAP and ensured the consistency and completeness of the sales configurator and related master data in the ERP system. Additionally, I acted as a subject matter expert in cross-departmental projects.
profile_positions.title: Product Configuration Expert

profile_positions.description:
Associate Consultant (Last Held Position)
As an Associate Consultant at TCS from 2011 to 2020, I worked on several critical projects executed for NXP Semiconductors in Europe and Bangalore. My role primarily involved serving as a Senior SAP SD Functional Consultant, with additional experience as an MM Consultant in Bangalore.

In Europe, I was involved in four major projects for NXP Semiconductors. These included the implementation of a new tool for real-time order promising, the creation of consolidated and single customer invoices, the development of a vendor-buyer interface, and the integration of the Order-to-Cash process of an acquired company into NXP's SAP system.

During my time in Bangalore, I worked on three significant projects. These included the establishment of a new sales organization and company code for a specific product group, the creation of a new SAP system for a client, and providing support for previously rolled-out SAP projects.

In all of these projects, I participated in various activities, including blueprinting, system configuration, data migration, and interface design and implementation. Additionally, I was involved in preparing functional design documents, proposing solutions, conducting design and configuration processes, and participating in integration testing and user acceptance testing.
profile_positions.title: SAP(SD) CONSULTANT

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for identifying and developing new business opportunities, building and maintaining relationships with key accounts, and providing technical support to customers. Additionally, I was in charge of preparing and delivering sales presentations and proposals, negotiating contracts, and ensuring customer satisfaction. I also worked closely with other departments within the company to ensure seamless delivery of products and services to customers. Overall, my role required a combination of technical knowledge and sales skills to meet the needs of our clients and drive revenue growth for the company.
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description: My role was to identify potential customers, promote the company's products, and close sales deals. I was responsible for conducting product demonstrations, providing technical assistance, and addressing customer inquiries and concerns. I played a critical role in establishing and maintaining strong customer relationships and worked closely with the marketing team to develop and implement sales strategies. Additionally, I was responsible for generating leads and meeting sales targets, while also providing regular reports to the management team.
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer
